name: concert
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 a performance of music by one or more musicians or singers: a pop/classical concert a school concert
More examplesFewer examplesI'm playing in a concert at the church hall next weekend.All the mothers and fathers had been invited to the end-of-term concert.The musicians are busy rehearsing for the concert.The choir will be performing the Hallelujah Chorus at the concert.She finished the concert with a song from her first album.
